articles.title: India steamroll Sri Lanka by nine wickets to win eighth U-19 Asia Cup title - Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: India reaffirmed their supremacy in the U-19 Asia Cup with a record eighth title as they hammered Sri Lanka by nine wickets in a rain-hit summit showd
articles.content:
Fifty from opener Angkrish Raghuvanshi guides India to their third consecutive U19 Asia Cup. - 106/9 in 38 Over https://t.co/2hWKkZK0S8
— AsianCricketCouncil (@ACCMedia1) 1640956869000

articles.title: Duterte's performance rating improves in December survey - CNN Philippines
articles.description: President Rodrigo Duterte's performance rating improved in December after he suffered a decline in his ratings two months ago, the latest Pulse Asia survey found.
articles.content: Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, December 31) President Rodrigo Duterte's performance rating improved in December after he suffered a decline in his ratings two months ago, the latest Pulse Asia survey… [+792 chars]

articles.title: Asia Looks To China-Focused Trade Block For Virus Recovery - NPR
articles.description: Members of the 15-member Regional and Comprehensive Economic Partnership, or RCEP, include China, Japan and South Korea. The new trading bloc does not include the U.S. or India.
articles.content: Members of a China-centered Asian trade bloc that takes effect Jan. 1 are hoping the initiative, encompassing about a third of world trade and business, will help drive their recoveries from the pand… [+4223 chars]

articles.title: Mercedes pulls ad amid debate over model's eyes | Fin24 - News24
articles.description: Mercedes-Benz removed a video advertisement from a Chinese social media website, state media said, after the clip got swept up in a charged national debate over depictions of Asian-looking features by foreign companies.
